contents:
Washington Times？

"The Washington Times was founded on May 17, 1982, by Unification movement leader Sun Myung Moon and owned until 2010 by News World Communications, an international media conglomerate founded by Moon. "

韩国邪教头子创办的报纸的可信度需要打个问号。

请不要把这个媒体跟 New York Times 和 Washington Post 搞混了。
